title: This structure contains the detailed information about why a Run Task has failed / not passed.

data.title: Data
data.description: The main `data` property specified by JSON:API

type.title: The JSON:API `type`
type.description: This is a fixed string of 'task-results' and may not be changed

attributes.title: The JSON:API `attributes` collection
attributes.description: This object describes the Run Task Result object properties.

status.title: Run Task Status
status.description: The current status of the Run Task.

message.title: Message
message.description: A short message describing the status of the task.

url.title: Url
url.description: A URL where users can obtain more information about the Run Task.

data.title: Data
data.description: An array of Run Task Outcomes, providing details as to why a specific integration may have failed.

RunTaskOutcome.title: Run Task Result Outcome
RunTaskOutcome.description: A detailed record containing information about a Run Task check that has contributed to the overall Run Task status.

outcome_id.title: Outcome ID
outcome_id.description: A partner supplied identifier. Note that this identifier does not have to be unique.

description.title: Description
description.description: A short one-line description of the outcome.

body.title: Body
body.description: Markdown text which will be rendered to the user in the Terraform Cloud Run UI.

url.title: Url
url.description: A URL linking this result to a page with more information, provided by the integration partner.

RunTaskTag.title: Run Task Result Tag
RunTaskTag.description: An object whose properties map to headings, each with an array of rich labels.

RunTaskRichLabel.title: Run Task Result Rich Label
RunTaskRichLabel.description: Defines text labels with optional status level used to denote icons and colors

label.title: Label
label.description: The text to display to the user

level.title: Level
level.description: Level, to be used rendering the label, defines the icon and color.
